official_title: A resolution to disapprove the proposed amendment to the Strategic Petroleum Reserve Plan which sets forth a method of drawdown and distribution of the Reserve (Department of Energy energy action numbered 5).

summary.text: Disapproves the proposed amendment to the strategic petroleum reserve plan which sets forth a method of drawdown and distribution of the reserve (Department of Energy energy action numbered 5).

titles.title: A resolution to disapprove the proposed amendment to the Strategic Petroleum Reserve Plan which sets forth a method of drawdown and distribution of the Reserve (Department of Energy energy action numbered 5).
